attributes.action: Tell us why deaths that are non Covid related are being marked as Covid
attributes.additional_details: Because these people are meant to be running the country and being honest with its people, a virus so deadly that the cures to stay at home for 14 days.  So deadly that we wear a mask in a restaurant, but as soon as we sit down to eat it’s safe ? I want the government to do there job correctly and I’m pretty sure the rest of the UK is behind me.
attributes.background: To give us real statistics ! On the actual amount of deaths Covid has caused. I don’t mean just labelling Covid. How many on record have actually died from that disease that’s so deadly. I know people in funeral directors who’ve been told to label every death as Covid.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551788
